help.description: DMs this message to the requester. Please do `help <command>` to get more details.

tag.description: Posts an embed in chat with the given details provided in the config file. The name is _not_ case sensitive.

warn.description: Performs the specified action to the targeted user. **Mod roles only**.

details.description: Add a new warning to the specified user.
Remove the oldest warning attached to the user.
Remove the newest warning attached to the user.
View the number of warnings attached to the user.

role.description: Performs the specified action with the named role to the user that sent the message.

details.description: Add the specified role to the requesting user.
Remove the specified role from the requesting user.
List all the available roles that can be added or removed. Does not require a target role.

airlock.description: When executed from a specific channel, assigns a user to a specific 'member' role.

cookieHunt.description: Claims a cookie if one was dropped recently and hasn't been claimed yet.
Announces the amount of cookies of the requesting user, or the users with the highest cookie counts.

details.description: List the users with the most cookies collected.

cookieHunt.description: Forces a cookie drop immediately and resets the drop randomizer. **Mod roles only**.

diceRoller.description: Calculates a role with the specified dice syntax.

details.description: Rolls a `y`-sided die `x` times, returning an integer.
Prioritizes the calculation `x` within the parentheses.

diceRoller.description: An alias for the `roll` command. Please do `help roll` for more details.
